price: 72. Taasi waa Jannadii aad ku dhaxasheen waxaad camalsan fasheen.
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡجَنَّةُ ٱلَّتِيٓ أُورِثۡتُمُوهَا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: watil'ka al-janatu allatī ūrith'tumūhā bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
